description: Successive denominators of Wallis's approximation to pi/2 (reduced).
references: H.-D. Ebbinghaus et al., Numbers, Springer, 1990, p. 146.
links: J. Sondow, A faster product for Pi and a new integral for ln(Pi/2), Amer. Math. Monthly 112 (2005), 729-734 and 113 (2006), 670.
mathematica: a[n_?EvenQ] := n!!^2/((n - 1)!!^2*(n + 1)); a[n_?OddQ] := (n - 1)!!^2*(n + 1)/n!!^2; Table[a[n] // Denominator, {n, 0, 23}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 19 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
